mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cookingtip_board (bno, category, content) VALUES (common_board_seq.currval, #{category}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT cb.bno, cb.title AS title, cb.writer AS writer, cb.regdate, cb.viewcnt, cb.replycnt, ct.category, ct.content FROM common_board cb JOIN cookingtip_board ct ON cb.bno = ct.bno WHERE cb.bno = #{bno}
SELECT bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt, uuid, uploadpath, filename FROM common_board WHERE bno > 0 AND boardId = 3 ORDER BY bno DESC, regdate DESC
